messages.title: The Green Party stands up for what matters
messages.content: Let's talk about what we all have in common, our shared needs and likes. Like green building methods for better health as well as climate change reduction—and yes, lower bills too. And like nuclear disarmament, since nuclear weapons, even if never used, are a great risk to the environment. Alongside cross-party and no-party, local groups, Calderdale Green Party campaigns tirelessly to reclaim the NHS and social care from cuts and privatisation. Let's build on these good foundations now.

messages.title: Why I'm standing as your Green Party candidate
messages.content: Since producing our ‘Turning Calderdale Green’ manifesto two years ago, Calderdale Green Party has publicly stood up many local measures to achieve our goals of Safe Climate, Air, and Rivers, Zero Waste, Decent Homes, Fair Economy, One Planet Economy, and decent public services... I hope people will share with me their views and thoughts about how to build a society that works for the common good, for both people and planet.

messages.title: About Me:
messages.content: I've been a humanitarian aid worker for 20 years and now live in Todmorden and work at Bradford University. But many people feel deeply disconnected from the political process.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recognition of the role of climate change in flooding and the need to make climate change a priority.
Tacklin both climate change and economic poverty while providing secure public services.
Alongside cross-party and no-party groups, Calderdale Green Party campaigns tirelessly to reclaim the NHS and social care from cuts and privatisation.
